column1: I really want to hear Rammstein do a cover of Benni Benassi’s cover of “Satisfaction”, in the style of “Du Hast”.
[Edit:  Wait, I mean Benassi’s version?  That wasn’t a cover of someone else, right?  I haven’t had my afternoon caffeine yet.]
Am i the only one who finds the sound of thunder really comforting?
friend: I’ve accomplished so much today. Finished an essay, worked on a group project, did all of my calculus homework for the week. What’d you do today?
…… I wrote “butts” on a chalkboard.
You can tell a lot about a person by the music they listen too. Hit shuffle on your iPod, Phone, iTunes or Spotify etc and write down the first 20 songs. Then pass this on. One rule: No Skipping
1. I’m Gonna Find Another You- John Mayer
2. Satisfaction- Rolling Stones
3. If I Had a Boat- James Vincent Mcmorrow
4. Caught Like a Fly- Falling in Reverse
5. Scene One- Sleeping with Sirens
6. Yellow- Coldplay
7. Hurt- 2 Cellos
8. I Wanna Be Like Me- Sara Bareilles
9. The Way that I Love You- Ashanti
10. Starlight- Matt Cardle
11. Through the Dark- One Direction
12. Classic- MKTO
13. I Wanna Dance With Somebody- Whitney Houston
14. Come Back to Bed- John Mayer
15. Below My Feet- Mumford and Sons
16. Rat Race- Bob Marley
17. This Ain’t a Scene It’s an Arms Race- Fall Out Boy
18. A Woman’s Worth- Alicia Keys
19. Propuesta indecente- Romeo Santos
20. The Darkest Side- The Middle East
I am so mad that Rise Against, Secondhand Serenade, and The Civil Wars aren’t there -.-

I took a picture of myself this morning with my webcam and HOT DAMN I LOOK LIKE A SUAVE GUY!!! O____O
I mean I’m not a guy but DUDE I LOOK LIKE A GUY TO ME, I LOOK LIKE A SUAVE AND SOPHISTICATED MOFO WHO COULD CHARM THE CLOTHING OFF OF ANY PERSON OF MY CHOOSING!!

except for the fact that I’m socially awkward and couldn’t charm you if I tried…as well as the fact that this is a Rei Ryugazaki cosplay and we all know he’s the dorkiest thing to ever breathe air on this planet.
I enjoy this way too much to the point that I believe I’m going to step foot into full blown crossplay territory.
